radiographic_examinations.findings: Elevation of the right hemidiaphragm and minimal atelectasis at the base of the right lung.
Postoperative changes in the left frontal lobe, consistent with the surgical evacuation of an intracranial hemorrhage in the past. Findings unchanged from a CT examination performed 2 years earlier.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Unchanged from the findings on a CT examination performed 2 years earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent opacities in both lower lobes, nodules in the posterior left upper lobe (6 to 7 mm) and right upper lobe (2 to 3 mm), enlarged mediastinal and right peridiaphragmatic lymph nodes, and a small left pleural effusion.
Evidence of mild pulmonary edema and persistent air-space opacities in the left lower lung.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Showed evidence of mild pulmonary edema and persistent air-space opacities.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: Postsurgical changes and no acute process.
Morphologic characteristics of the liver compatible with cirrhosis and splenomegaly (19.5 cm), with no evidence of cholelithiasis or cholecystitis.
Consolidation in the left upper lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of the mass in the left upper lobe, with central necrosis.
